short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MetaMan is your ultimate Chrome extension for seamless access to Facebook's internal platform APIs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MetaMan is your ultimate Chrome extension for seamless access to Facebook's internal platform APIs. Whether you're a developer, marketer, or enthusiast, MetaMan empowers you to harness the full potential of Facebook's data and services like never before.
